resources.string: How to start the cycling trip?
You can tap on the cycling icon to start the trip. When you start the trip you can see you distance travelled,time and speed.
Are my cycling trip details stored somewhere?

Your cycling trip details are not stored if you are not logged in. Once you register and login your details get stored in the our database and you can also see the details of your previous trips by clicking on history.
How do I abort a trip?

You can cancel or abort a trip by clicking on the grey cancel button which is at the bottom in cycling page. If you abort/cancel a trip the details of that trip will not be stored in the database even if you are logged in.
How do I stop a trip?
You can stop a trip by clicking on the round stop button. The details of the stopped trips will be saved in the database if you are logged in

Goto the register page enter your name, valid mobile and password and click on register. You will then be redirected to the OTP verification page.On that page enter the 4 digit number that will be sent to your mobile number and click on verify. If you have correctly done all the above you will be registered and logged in.
What does the summary page show me?

When you stop a cycling trip your are redirected to summary page on which you can see the total distance that you travelled during that trip the time taken in that trip and the average speed in that trip.
